text: 17.12: Sng 41.9; 109.8; Zo 6.39; 13.18; 18.9; FG 1.20; Hi 2.13; 1 Zo 2.19Gu mben han kav, gu ndu zɨn ŋkasŋkar panan, gu mbe garagagi. Mba zɨ, ana ndu zɨ ma, ndu anan na nɨɨŋgi. Gu gangana vhuuŋra mbe mbuim, mbe the mbarɨgi fhuvara. Mba na tha vui guma, ana nduara mbar rɨgɨrga tuktɨgi. Maaŋ muuŋgirga, ndun buni vhuuiŋ ki gap suaŋgi kameŋ, ne guigira hɨgɨrga.
